input_data.title: American Gigolo
input_data.overview: Julian Kaye has always been an object of desire, so much so that people are willing to destroy him in order to have him. Exonerated, after 15 years in prison for a murder he didnâ€™t commit, he now faces the challenge of picking up the pieces as the detective who put him behind bars tries to unravel the mystery that led to his wrongful incarceration.

response.analytical_summary: American Gigolo is a neo-noir drama series that reimagines the 1980 film of the same name. The story follows Julian Kaye, a man recently released from prison after serving fifteen years for a crime he didn't commit. As he attempts to reintegrate into society and rebuild his life, he is drawn back into the dangerous world of high-end escorting while a detective investigates the circumstances surrounding his wrongful conviction. The series explores themes of identity, redemption, and the complexities of justice, blending crime procedural elements with a character-driven narrative and a stylish aesthetic.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Julian Kaye's release from prison, fifteen years after being convicted of murder. He is immediately contacted by Lorenzo Stiletto, a former client who offers him a chance to resume his career as a high-end escort. Simultaneously, Detective Natasha 'Tash' Baptiste, the officer who originally investigated Julian's case, remains convinced of his guilt and begins a new investigation, reopening old wounds and uncovering hidden connections. As Julian navigates the world of wealthy clients and dangerous secrets, he struggles to reconcile his past with his desire for a new beginning. The investigation reveals a web of deceit involving powerful figures and long-buried truths about the murder Julian was wrongly accused of committing. Julian's past clients and associates become suspects, and he must confront the people who orchestrated his downfall while trying to clear his name and find the real killer. The series explores the intricate relationships between Julian, Lorenzo, and Tash, revealing their intertwined histories and motivations as the truth about the murder slowly comes to light, exposing a conspiracy that reaches the highest levels of society.
response.keyword_sentence: American Gigolo is a stylish neo-noir crime drama set in modern-day Los Angeles, exploring themes of redemption and wrongful conviction through the story of a man seeking justice while navigating a world of secrets and high-end escorting.
